```yaml
sections:
  SEC-A:
    anchorage:
      view: "background"
      phase: "exploration"
    occurrences: ["OCC-1"]
  SEC-B:
    anchorage:
      view: "decision"
      phase: "confirmed"
    occurrences: ["OCC-2"]
occurrences:
  OCC-1:
    role: "observation"
    entity: "IE-1"
  OCC-2:
    role: "decision"
    entity: "IE-2"
entities:
  IE-1:
    kind: "observation"
  IE-2:
    kind: "decision"
structure:
  sections: ["SEC-A", "SEC-B"]
```
